channel.title: The xbox 360 games thread... post here about any game
channel.description:
Um yeah just post about any xbox game here...
If Your Good at Gears Of War i mean REALLY GOOD and would want to be in a clan... Add me on xbl OmS JoNeSwOrTh Go here to sign up... nxgamers.com Make an account... Search for clan One More Shot OmS ill have a 2v1 or 1v1 scrim with you, you beat me or me and my friend your in.

item.title: The xbox 360 games thread... post here about any game

item.description:
@I_Mr_Phat_I wrote:

I think that halo 3 is really over rated but… w/e lol cod4 is a great game but still gears owns it all i think.

Read full topic

item.description:
@system wrote:

Halo 3 is a great game.Assassins Creed is a good game but somewhat repetitive and COD 4 is as well a good game but lots of people go to that because they suck at Halo 3.
